subject: Public Speaking
title: Measuring Speech Impact
description: A short lesson to help you apply Measuring Speech Impact.

hook.text: Did your speech work? Applause isn't the measure. Action is.

buildup.text: Track behavior changes, conversations, and follow-through.

discovery.text: Surveys immediately after measure satisfaction, not persuasion.

twist.text: Real impact reveals itself weeks and months later.

climax.text: The best speakers follow up and measure long-term change.

punchline.text: Measure action, not applause. That's real impact.

quiz.question: How should speech impact be measured?
options: Behavior changes and follow-through over time
